content.body: @sffc:mozilla.org do you know when Chrome plans to ship throwing RangeError in `Intl.DateTimeFormat` for legacy non-IANA tzs?
content.formatted_body: @sffc do you know when Chrome plans to ship throwing RangeError in Intl.DateTimeFormat for legacy non-IANA tzs?

content.body: You mean the Time Zone Canonicalization proposal? I don't think throwing in that circumstance is part of the proposal
